name: Tonys Crispy Crisps
description:
Tony's is the largest company in the world that conquered people's hearts with its corn flakes chain "Tony's Crispy crisps".

The lovely mascots Molly and Tony are known and loved all over the world. The special thing about the cornflakes is their breathtaking taste, the price that you can't even dream of and massiv amount of tastes that are added daily.

So go and buy Tony's Crispy Crisps!
